english: Buddhism; Buddhist teachings; Buddhist religion; Buddhist doctrine

etymology.description: 佛 (Buddha) + 教 (teachings; religion) = Buddhist religion/teachings.
etymology.interpretation: Combines 佛 (Buddha) with 教 (religion/teachings) to denote Buddhism as both doctrine and organized religion. Used for the faith, its teachings, institutions, and related matters.

examples.chinese: 他研究佛教历史(他研究佛教歷史)。
examples.english: He studies the history of Buddhism.

examples.chinese: 这座寺庙属于佛教禅宗(這座寺廟屬於佛教禪宗)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè zuò sìmiào shǔyú Fójiào Chánzōng.
examples.english: This temple belongs to the Chan school of Buddhism.

examples.chinese: 她在大学选修佛教哲学(她在大學選修佛教哲學)。
examples.pinyin: Tā zài dàxué xuǎnxiū Fójiào zhéxué.
examples.english: She is taking Buddhist philosophy as an elective at university.
